revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: A Paraphrase and Notes on the Epistles of St. Paul to the Colossians, Philippians, and Hebrews: after the Manner of Mr. Locke. To which are annexed several critical..."
revision.text: Possibly: A Paraphrase and Notes on the Epistles of St. Paul to the Colossians, Philippians, and Hebrews: after the Manner of Mr. Locke. To which are annexed several critical dissertations on particular texts of scripture. By the late Reverend and learned Mr. James Peirce, of Exon. With a paraphrase and notes on the three last chapters of the Hebrews left unfinish'd by Mr. Peirce; and an essay to discover the author of the epistle and language in which it was originally written. By Joseph Hallett jun. (James Peirce). 2nd ed. (London : Printed for J. Noon, at the While Hart near Mercers Chapel Cheapside, M.DCC.XXXIII. [1733]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2409175~S1
